txt.en: Wargs roam freely about the Howling Wood near Floodwend, forcing the Rohirrim to abandon a valuable worksite. The Wargs must be driven out.

'I asked you to tell me stories of your battle against the Wargs in our forest, and you did not disappoint me! I long to wet my own blade with the blood of foes.\n\n'I am my father's son. I was not made to sit in stuffy halls and let my sword-arm grow weak with disuse.'
Wargs roam freely about the Howling Wood near Floodwend, forcing the Rohirrim to abandon a valuable worksite. The Wargs must be driven out.
Defeat Wargs in The Howling Wood ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Wargs can be found at the abandoned worksite east of Floodwend.\n\nYou should defeat many Wargs in the forest to the east.
Tell Thane Radwig of your victory against the Wargs
The young Thane Radwig can be found in the Mead Hall of Floodwend.\n\nYou should return to the Thane.
